mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, PROVINCE_ID, CITY_ID, DISTRICT_ID, PRODUCT_ID, SALE_TIME, SALE_COUNT, ADDRESS
mapper.select: SELECT sd.SALE_COUNT, sd.SALE_TIME, p1.NAME, p1.WEIGHT, p1.PRICE, p2.PROVINCENAME, c.CITYNAME, d.DISTRICTNAME,u.USERNAME,sd.ADDRESS FROM SALE_DETAIL sd, PRODUCTION p1, PICKUP_POINT pp,USER u,PROVINCE p2, CITY c, DISTRICT d where sd.PRODUCT_ID = p1.PRODUCT_ID and sd.PROVINCE_ID = p2.PROVINCEID and sd.CITY_ID = c.ID and sd.DISTRICT_ID = d.DISTRICTID and pp.USERID = u.USERID and pp.PROVINCE_ID = sd.PROVINCE_ID and pp.CITY_ID = sd.CITY_ID and pp.DISTRICT_ID = sd.DISTRICT_ID and pp.ADDRESS = sd.ADDRESS

SELECT sd.SALE_COUNT, sd.SALE_TIME, p1.NAME , p1.WEIGHT, p1.PRICE, pc.NAME as NAME1 ,p2.PROVINCENAME, c.CITYNAME, d.DISTRICTNAME,sd.ADDRESS FROM SALE_DETAIL sd, PRODUCTION p1, PROVINCE p2, CITY c, DISTRICT d ,PRODUCT_COMPANY pc where sd.PRODUCT_ID = p1.ID and p1.COMPANY_ID= pc.ID and sd.PROVINCE_ID = p2.PROVINCEID and sd.CITY_ID = c.ID and sd.DISTRICT_ID = d.DISTRICTID and sd.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT sd.SALE_COUNT, sd.SALE_TIME, p1.NAME, p1.WEIGHT, p1.PRICE, p2.PROVINCENAME, c.CITYNAME, d.DISTRICTNAME, sd.ADDRESS FROM SALE_DETAIL sd, PRODUCTION p1, PROVINCE p2, CITY c, DISTRICT d where sd.PRODUCT_ID = p1.PRODUCT_ID and sd.PROVINCE_ID = p2.PROVINCEID and sd.CITY_ID = c.ID and sd.DISTRICT_ID = d.DISTRICTID
mapper.insert:
insert into SALE_DETAIL
ID,
USER_ID,
PROVINCE_ID,
CITY_ID,
DISTRICT_ID,
PRODUCT_ID,
SALE_TIME,
SALE_COUNT,
ADDRESS,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{saleCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update SALE_DETAIL
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SALE_TIME = #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SALE_COUNT = #{saleCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update SALE_DETAIL set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PROVINCE_ID = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CITY_ID = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISTRICT_ID = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PRODUCT_ID = #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SALE_TIME = #{saleTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SALE_COUNT = #{saleCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
